sections: Learn more about our latest featured dealer.

is a major player in the automotive collector car industry. They are a full service classic automotive dealership and museum, specializing in buying, selling and trading as well as consignments, financing, appraisals and domestic and international shipping. A massive 27,000 plus square foot showroom is placed on three acres and they host around 200 talk in visitors every single day.
Inside their facility, you’ll find a wide variety of high end, investment grade restorations and driver quality collectible cars from the 1920s through to the 1970s. The

mission is to offer the  highest quality, restored classic cars to the world; while offering these vehicles at a fair market price. Their love and passion for classic cars, trucks and motorcycles gives them a collector car eye, giving them an edge of relatability in the market.

is one of the hottest attractions for tourists visiting Ideal Classic Cars. In an effort to give back to the community and attract new car enthusiasts, they offer free admission to the public. This draws in people who might not have found their love for the automobile yet, but the showroom of over 100 gorgeous classic cars, trucks and motorcycles will certainly draw them in. The museum is lined with hot rods, street rods, European models, muscle cars and originals all available for purchase.

caters to avid and experienced car collectors to international brokers to first time classic automobile owner. They put great emphasis on building long-term relationships with our buyers and brokers to bring a high quality selection to the market. If you’re looking to start or add to a collection, or maybe make room in your garage for something new, it’s time to check them out!
